# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are extending an offer to sell this product to you for $9,500. We understand that such an investment is significant, and we assure you that it will provide substantial returns on your investment. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a smooth transaction with excellent customer service. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
